title: Environment Is Travis CI
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of JavaScript programming language through a series of hands-on exercises. The purpose of this lab is to help you gain a foundational understanding of JavaScript syntax, data types, operators, control structures, functions, and objects. By the end of this lab, you will have the knowledge and skills necessary to write basic JavaScript programs and build simple applications.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
